trans-unit.source: Added missing namespace declaration to avoid the warning about it. [wiggy]
trans-unit.target: Añadió la declaración del espacio de nombres que faltaba para evitar la advertencia sobre ello.[wiggy]

trans-unit.source: Added support for Dexterity content types. Link integrity support for Dexterity requires the plone.app.referenceablebehavior behavior to be enabled so that the Dexterity item can be used with Archetypes references. [jpgimenez]
trans-unit.target: Añadido soporte para los tipos de contenido de Destreza.El soporte de integridad de enlaces para Dexterity requiere que se habilite el comportamiento referenciable plone.app.referenceablebehavior para que el elemento Dexterity se pueda utilizar con referencias a Archetypes.[jpgimenez]

trans-unit.source: Added support for sub path after uid of resolveuid [hoka]
trans-unit.target: Añadido el soporte para el sub camino después del uid de resolveuid [hoka]

trans-unit.source: Added view for updating link integrity information for all site content [witsch]
trans-unit.target: Añadida vista para actualizar la información sobre la integridad del enlace para todo el contenido del sitio [witsch]

trans-unit.target: Ajustar las pruebas a la URL cambiada utilizada para la

trans-unit.source: Avoid a bug during link integrity check when a source or target of the reference has been already removed during the deletion process. This can happen during large delete processes. [thomasdesvenain]
trans-unit.target: Evitar un error durante la comprobación de la integridad del enlace cuando una fuente u objetivo de la referencia ya ha sido eliminado durante el proceso de supresión.Esto puede ocurrir durante procesos de eliminación de gran tamaño.[thomasdesvenain]

trans-unit.source: Avoid using the deprecated five:implements directive. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Evita usar la desaprobada directiva de "Cinco Implementos".[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Changes in 3.0
trans-unit.target: Cambios en 3.0

trans-unit.source: Compare UIDs instead of objects during cleanup of breach information in order to avoid expensive hashing in “… in …” expressions. This makes removing linked objects much faster. [regebro]
trans-unit.target: Compare UIDs instead of objects during cleanup of breach information in order to avoid expensive hashing in “… in …” expressions. This makes removing linked objects much faster. [regebro]

trans-unit.target: ConflictErrors

trans-unit.target: Convierte la configuración de la prueba en

trans-unit.source: Customization
trans-unit.target: Personalización

trans-unit.source: Dexterity: use zope.lifecycleevent instead of zope.app.container interfaces for Plone 4.3 support. [jone]
trans-unit.target: Destreza:utilice zope.lifecycleevent en lugar de las interfaces de zope.app.container para el soporte de Plone 4.3.[jone]

trans-unit.source: Do not abort if a text field is
trans-unit.target: No abortar si un campo de texto es

trans-unit.source: Do not fail on invalid objects in reference_catalog. Fixes issue 32 and 48. [pbauer]
trans-unit.target: Do not fail on invalid objects in reference_catalog. Fixes issue 32 and 48. [pbauer]

trans-unit.source: Don’t install the exception hook in Zope 2.12 where it is no longer needed and breaks exception handling. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Don’t install the exception hook in Zope 2.12 where it is no longer needed and breaks exception handling. [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Don’t show delete_confirmation_info twice in delete_confirmation. Fixes #27 [pbauer]
trans-unit.target: Don’t show delete_confirmation_info twice in delete_confirmation. Fixes #27 [pbauer]

trans-unit.source: Don’t use id() to record confirmed items. It can change on request boundaries. Use an encoded _p_oid instead. [optilude]
trans-unit.target: Don’t use id() to record confirmed items. It can change on request boundaries. Use an encoded _p_oid instead. [optilude]

trans-unit.source: Drop the Archetypes-dependency by switching to use zc.relation instead of reference_catalog (Products.Archetypes). [bloodbare, pbauer, vangheem]
trans-unit.target: Elimine la dependencia de los arquetipos cambiando al uso de zc.relation en lugar de reference_catalog (Productos.Arquetipos).[bloodbare,pbauer,vangheem]

trans-unit.source: Each breach in
trans-unit.target: Cada brecha en

trans-unit.source: Eggification and move into plone.app namespace [optilude]
trans-unit.target: La simplificación y el paso al espacio de nombres de plone.app [optilude]

trans-unit.source: Exceptions now return the repr() and not the str() of the object. This way we avoid, for File content types, loading the whole object data into memory. This closes https://dev.plone.org/ticket/13519 [ericof]
trans-unit.target: Exceptions now return the repr() and not the str() of the object. This way we avoid, for File content types, loading the whole object data into memory. This closes https://dev.plone.org/ticket/13519 [ericof]

trans-unit.source: Explicitly load zcml of dependencies, instead of using
trans-unit.target: Cargar explícitamente zcml de dependencias,en lugar de usar

trans-unit.source: Features
trans-unit.target: Características

trans-unit.source: Fix #13681, documents referencing each other will now also trigger a link integrity warning. [do3cc]
trans-unit.target: Arreglo #13681,los documentos que se refieran entre sí ahora también activarán una advertencia de integridad del enlace.[do3cc]

trans-unit.source: Fix a missing tal condition in
trans-unit.target: Arreglar una condición de tal que falta en

trans-unit.source: Fix a problem with updating link integrity references during a request which trying to delete multiple other objects. [witsch]
trans-unit.target: Solucionar un problema de actualización de las referencias de integridad de los enlaces durante una solicitud que intente eliminar otros objetos múltiples.[witsch]

trans-unit.source: Fix a remove confirmation view bug. Displays the portal type title rather than the portal type name. This change also broke some tests that were checking for the name rather than the title, but I just fixed those. [jianaijun]
trans-unit.target: Arreglar un error de la vista de confirmación de eliminación.Muestra el título del tipo de portal en lugar del nombre del tipo de portal.Este cambio también rompió algunas pruebas que buscaban el nombre en lugar del título,pero acabo de arreglarlas.[jianaijun]

trans-unit.source: Fix an error in handling absolute links to objects within the portal, which prevented references from being created based on those links. This closes https://dev.plone.org/ticket/12402 [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Fix an error in handling absolute links to objects within the portal, which prevented references from being created based on those links. This closes https://dev.plone.org/ticket/12402 [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Fix code to not silently swallow
trans-unit.target: Fijar el código para no tragar silenciosamente

trans-unit.source: Fix decoding of colon-delimited list of confirmed oids in the request when one of the oids contains a colon. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Fijar la decodificación de la lista de oides confirmados en la solicitud cuando uno de los oides contenga un colon.[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Fix findObject to also catch the ZTK NotFound exception which may be raised by request.traverseName. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10549 [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Fix findObject to also catch the ZTK NotFound exception which may be raised by request.traverseName. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10549 [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Fix handling of relative links instead of relying on Acquisition. [witsch]
trans-unit.target: Arreglar el manejo de los enlaces relativos en lugar de confiar en la adquisición.[witsch]

trans-unit.source: Fix html structure in confirmation.pt [vincentfretin]
trans-unit.target: Fijar la estructura html en confirmation.pt [vincentfretin]

trans-unit.source: Fix integrity reference generation for content not accessible by the editor. [witsch]
trans-unit.target: Fijar la generación de referencia de integridad para el contenido no accesible por el editor.[witsch]

trans-unit.source: Fix issue with dangling references to already removed objects. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/8349 and http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/8390. [witsch]
trans-unit.target: Fix issue with dangling references to already removed objects. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/8349 and http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/8390. [witsch]

trans-unit.source: Fix issue with the final submission of the delete confirmation page in Zope 2.12. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/9699. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Fix issue with the final submission of the delete confirmation page in Zope 2.12. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/9699. [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Fix object url in delete confirmation [vangheem]
trans-unit.target: Fijar el objeto url en la confirmación de borrado [vangheem]

trans-unit.source: Fix some tests to make sure that text values are treated as text/html in Zope 2.12, whose zope.contenttype is stricter when guessing the mimetype. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Arreglar algunas pruebas para asegurar que los valores de texto se traten como texto/html en el Zope 2.12,cuyo tipo de contenido zope.content es más estricto a la hora de adivinar el mimetipo.[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Fix test isolation problems: if a test calls transaction.commit() directly or indirectly it can not be an integration test, either avoid the commit or change the layer into a functional one. Fixes: https://github.com/plone/plone.app.linkintegrity/issues/36 [gforcada]
trans-unit.target: Fix test isolation problems: if a test calls transaction.commit() directly or indirectly it can not be an integration test, either avoid the commit or change the layer into a functional one. Fixes: https://github.com/plone/plone.app.linkintegrity/issues/36 [gforcada]

trans-unit.target: Arreglar la prueba para que funcione con plone.login fusionado.[jensens]

trans-unit.source: Linkintegrity-relations are no longer stored in reference_catalog of Products.Archetypes. Instead it used zc.relation.

trans-unit.source: Monkey patch the Zope HTTPResponse status_code to include a mapping for linkintegritynotificationexception, to return a 200 code. [thepjot]

trans-unit.source: No longer intercept the request on
trans-unit.target: Ya no interceptar la solicitud de

trans-unit.source: No longer intercept the request on manage_deleteObjects. Instead only inject a warning in delete_confirmation. This means that deleting with other methods (like manage_deleteObjects, plone.api.content.delete, ttw in the ZMI) no longer warns about linkintegrity-breaches. [bloodbare, pbauer, vangheem]
trans-unit.target: Ya no interceptamos la solicitud en manage_deleteObjects.En su lugar,sólo inyecte una advertencia en delete_confirmation.Esto significa que el borrado con otros métodos (como manage_deleteObjects,plone.api.content.delete,ttw en el ZMI)ya no advierte sobre violaciones de la integridad de los enlaces.[bloodbare,pbauer,vangheem]

trans-unit.source: No more zope.app dependencies. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: No más dependencias de zope.app.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: No significant changes.
trans-unit.target: No hay cambios significativos.

trans-unit.target: Ninguno

trans-unit.target: Partially disable the test regarding the undo log as the outcome differs between Plone 3 and 4, probably due to changes in the test setup. Refs http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/7784 [witsch]

trans-unit.source: Prevent linkintegrity-handler from doing anything when it is switched of in the registry. This change also prevents some issues in migration from AT to DX since linkintegrity is disabled during the migration. [pbauer]
trans-unit.target: Evitar que el gestor de la integridad de la conexión haga algo cuando se cambie de registro.Este cambio también evita algunos problemas en la migración de AT a DX,ya que linkintegrity se desactiva durante la migración.[pbauer]

trans-unit.source: Skip events subscribers during copy&paste of content items. This fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/12206. [gotcha]
trans-unit.target: Skip events subscribers during copy&paste of content items. This fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/12206. [gotcha]

trans-unit.source: Support for any
trans-unit.target: El apoyo a cualquier

trans-unit.source: Support resolveuid/UID references explicitely, by parsing and resolving these ourselves instead of relying on a view or script (which doesn’t work). This fixes linkintegrity for sites with link-by-uid turned on. This closes https://dev.plone.org/ticket/12104 [mj]
trans-unit.target: Support resolveuid/UID references explicitely, by parsing and resolving these ourselves instead of relying on a view or script (which doesn’t work). This fixes linkintegrity for sites with link-by-uid turned on. This closes https://dev.plone.org/ticket/12104 [mj]

trans-unit.source: Test if linkintegrity-feature is enables for users.
trans-unit.target: Pruebe si la función de integridad del vínculo está habilitada para los usuarios.

trans-unit.target: Este paquete se encarga de eliminar un elemento de la interfaz de usuario de Plone-Usuario (es decir,eliminar elementos de la vista

trans-unit.source: This package implement link integrity checking in Plone. It makes use of the zope3 event system in order to modify Plone itself as little as possible.
trans-unit.target: Este paquete implementa la comprobación de la integridad del enlace en Plone.Utiliza el sistema de eventos de zope3 para modificar Plone lo menos posible.
